## Skill Name

What would this skill be called? (e.g., growthOS-pricing)

## What It Does

Describe what this skill would help Shopify app developers accomplish.

## When to Use It

What situation or trigger phrase would activate this skill?

## Example Interaction

Show a brief example of how a developer would interact with this skill:

> **User:** "Help me with [task]"
> **GrowthOS:** [what the skill would do]

## Files It Would Create/Modify

What markdown files would this skill read from or write to in the `marketing/` directory?

## Shopify-Specific Value

Why is this particularly valuable for Shopify app developers vs generic marketing?
